name: Tile Match 3D - Matching Game
description:
Get ready to discover a new fun match 3D puzzle adventure! Play today and enjoy addictive gameplay filled with cool features and amazing puzzles.

Practice your skills with plenty of well-designed brain training levels.


Sort and match three objects from a pile of items and eliminate them from the board. Use boosters at the right time to quickly complete the challenges and win the level.

Once you start matching 3D tiles -you can’t stop! Practice your skills, connect tiles and enjoy a triple win!



PLAYING Tile Match 3D is easy to learn, here’s what you need to do:
- Drag different objects to collect them
- Complete the goal that is set at the start of each level
- NOTE! Each level has a timer, so you must move fast & reach the level goal!
- Use the boosters to help you pass tricky levels
- Use Shuffle to rearrange the items on the board
- Boost your match 3d game with the Hint and Super Hint
- Enjoy the fun gameplay and cool features like cards and gem collections
- Win great rewards along the way!


Enjoy these Awesome Features:
Plenty of FUN match 3d puzzles- Sort through the hidden objects and clear the board!
Amazing boosters and hints to help you pass tricky levels
Enjoyable brain training levels that will boost your memory and matching skills
Beautiful, vivid visual effects
Easy to learn and super fun matching game
Relaxing triple matching 3D game
Free to play online or offline, no Wi-Fi or internet connection is required





Fans of mahjong and matching games will be pleased to discover a new awesome gameplay experience that is fun for everyone to play. Sharpen your logic skills and train your brain to solve addicting triple 3D puzzles.



Download Tile Match 3D now and join the matching fun!
